title: Valvata aliena
text:
Valvata aliena is a <a href="species">species</a> of minute <a href="freshwater%20snail">freshwater snail</a> with an <a href="Operculum%20%28gastropod%29">operculum</a>, an <a href="Aquatic%20animal">aquatic</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the family <a href="Valvatidae">Valvatidae</a>, the valve snails.
Distribution.
This species lives in <a href="Siberia">Siberia</a>.
